full_description:
XTRA Active R16 Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The XTRA Active R16 Smart Watch is an advanced smart gadget that will improve your everyday life with its remarkable capabilities and beautiful appearance. This wristwatch has an ultra-clear big screen that provides maximum sight even in harsh sunshine. The 1.39-inch HD screen, with a high resolution of 360 x 360, displays a complete one-screen overview of message reminders, motion statistics, and other information. With a peak brightness of 280 nits, you can readily see information on the display even in bright light. Stay connected easily with the Bluetooth voice call function, which allows you to answer incoming calls directly from your wrist with a simple button click. This function is convenient since it allows you to manage calls while on the road without having to reach for your smartphone. Once the watch is smoothly connected to the accompanying smartphone app, you will be able to experience the power of intelligent voice assistance. Voice commands provide hands-free control of many tasks, making interactions with your wristwatch more simple and easy. The XTRA Active R16 Smart Watch is designed to follow you in a variety of settings, including wet ones, owing to its IP67 waterproof rating. This degree of water resistance means that the watch can tolerate everyday contact with water, making it appropriate for activities like handwashing and rain. Improve your fitness journey with the multi-sport mode, which allows you to track and monitor your activity across various workouts. You may also personalize your watch face with over 100 different options to match your style and tastes. The XTRA Active R16 Smart Watch blends design, functionality, and durability to provide a smooth and feature-rich experience for consumers looking for a flexible wearable device in their everyday lives.

This stylish smartwatch boasts a 1.45" TFT full-screen touch display that offers a user-friendly interface for effortless navigation. With Bluetooth calling capabilities, you can easily make and receive calls directly from your wrist, keeping you connected on the go. The smartwatch is powered by a 250mAh battery, ensuring long-lasting performance throughout the day. To optimize battery consumption, users can set the Always On Display mode from the display options, allowing them to see the time at a glance without draining unnecessary power. With its impressive IP68 water resistance rating, the XTRA Active R28 smartwatch is protected against dust and water ingress, making it suitable for various activities, including swimming and outdoor workouts. This smartwatch goes beyond just telling time. It includes a Breathe mode, guiding users through breathing exercises lasting from one to five minutes. This feature promotes relaxation and helps users take care of their mental and physical well-being, especially during stressful moments. The smartwatch offers Female Health Tracking, empowering users to record their menstrual period. Using this data, the watch can provide intelligent predictions about the timing and duration of upcoming menstrual and fertile periods. This feature gives women peace of mind and helps them plan ahead. The XTRA Active R28 smartwatch is a versatile health companion. It leverages the built-in gyroscope and accelerometer to track your movements accurately. Moreover, it can detect the different stages of your sleep cycle, providing valuable insights into the quality of your rest and overall sleep patterns. Whether you're looking for a device to keep you connected, improve your well-being, or monitor your health, the XTRA Active R28 Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch offers a comprehensive set of features to meet your needs.
